#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int cs, n, m, i, res, mx;
int A[2001];
int main()
{
	scanf("%d", &cs);
	while (cs--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
		for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
			scanf("%d",&A[i]);
		res = m;
		mx = A[n-1];
		for (i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--)
		{
			res = max(res, m / A[i] * (mx - A[i]) + m);
			mx = max(mx, A[i]);
		}
		printf("%d\n", res);
	}
	return 0;
}
